FuncDef: This command defines the format of the User-Name AVP value in Diameter NASREQ AA-Requests for IPoE hosts.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the format of the User-Name AVP value. Values-mac - Specifies to use the MAC source address of the DHCPv4 DISCOVER or DHCPv6 SOLICIT message in the user-name field. The format of the MAC address string is defined with the mac-format CLI command.
